Summary: Flashes with 4 Bright orange balls and strange events to follow
divs: sighting detailsthis is not what everyone says they say at 10pm last evening i sat in my recliner watching a movie about jesse james and there seemed to be a series of flashes bright white\blue flashes which caught my eye and made me think there was a squad car out front so i reached over and pulled the curtain only to see three large bright orange balls just above the tree line some 100 yards away this balls where in a straight line but diagonal from ground to sky like pointing into the woods i fourth light was seen but as i seen that the last one was gone this happened so quick and i closed my eyes thinking a plane was crashing right outside i took a minute and called to my niece asking if she seen that she said no and i got up to go to the porch i stood out side explaining to her i just seen the strangest thing ever and we looked around the sky and woods as the path of this was towards the woods a good 5 minutes outside we heard a almost thunder like rumble off in the distance like a thunderstorm rolling in i called my sister maybe 10 minutes after the lights asking if she seen anything and she said no another 10 minutes or so i called my mother and said did you see anything before?? and she was like no i wasnt outside and went on to tell me how people seen a meteor in the sky i dont know anything about stars and metours and things of that nature but what i seen couldnt fly diagonally with out hitting the ground near by if it was falling from the sky i told my mom that what i seen had to hit the ground in the woods near my home it couldnt travel at that angle without that happening as i was telling her i seen a light at the top of the bluff of trees and i said i think someone must have a flashlight out lookin in the woods at that moment i was speechless as the light turrned a bright glowing green circle almost as if someone put a green stoplight in the woods i asked my niece if she seen it and see did she was trying to get her camara on her phone to take a pic but the light was to far away then the light seemed to change shape into lines and back to circle and started raising higher and then it was gone i was speechless and kinda freaked out my mother told me to call the police and i refused as i am not a believer in things and i dont want to be a crack pot but what i seen is real and what i seen i can not explain please help me figure out or atleast set my mind at ease on what i might have seen because a metour dosent do what happened i am tempted to look in the woods but kinda afraid at the same time
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Dubuque
There were no other sightings in Dubuque on or around April 14th 2010
